String.string: [Rootstock] Create a Farmer's Almanac
"Sure, I can help."
Collect floretta and fill the first page of the Farmer's Almanac.
You've completed page 1. To complete the next page, you need a taproot.
Collect a taproot and fill up the next page.
You've completed page 2. To complete the next page, you need a mudroot.
Collect a mudroot and fill up the next page.
You've completed page 3. To complete the next page, you need a moongourd.
Collect a moongourd and fill up the next page.
You've completed page 4. To complete the next page, you need a flame pepper.
Collect a flame pepper and fill up the next page.
You've completed page 5. To complete the next page, you need cobseed.
Collect cobseed and fill up the next page.
You've completed page 6. To complete the next page, you need a shevranberry.
Collect a shevranberry and fill up the next page.
You've completed page 7. To complete the next page, you need a sky lotus.
Collect a sky lotus and fill up the next page.
You've completed the Farmer's Almanac! Take it to Millia.
Hand over the Farmer's Almanac.
Take the completed Farmer's Almanac to Millia.
Take the completed Farmer's Almanac to Millia.
